response.original_title: Richard Ashcroft: Break the Night with Colours
response.overview: After Richard Ashcroft gained notoriety as the voice of the Verve (composers of the chart-topping "Bittersweet Symphony"), a gushing Chris Martin of Coldplay publicly praised the vocalist as "the best singer in the world." Short but sweet, this video contains two versions of the title tune and a music video of the same; a "making of the video" featurette; and the previously unreleased song "Slip Sliding."
response.title: Richard Ashcroft: Break the Night with Colours
